alert.note: Alert for Barton; Ellsworth; Lincoln; Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 7:36PM CDT until June 05 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Lincoln County in central Kansas... Western Ellsworth County in central Kansas... Southeastern Russell County in central Kansas... Northeastern Barton County in central Kansas... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 735 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Milberger, or 10 miles southeast of Russell, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wilson, Holyrood, Dorrance, Bunker Hill, Susank, Wilson State Park and Wilson Lake. This includes Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 189 and 212. This warning replaces the previous severe thunderstorm warning for western Russell county. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
